sk1.name: Smoke Screen
sk1.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks. Lasts 6 seconds.

sk2.name: Blink Strike
sk2.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

sk3.name: Backstab
sk3.desc: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.

sk4.name: Permanent Invisibility
sk4.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, staying permanently invisible except while attacking. While silenced, Riki will be visible.
